svg.text: You govern a basketball league. The simulation runs itself. Your power lives in the rules.
Reflections inform your next governance decisions
Wild Proposals (Tier 5 or low AI confidence)
Go to vote immediately like any other proposal. Admin also gets a DM and can veto before tally.
If admin vetoes: proposal removed, tokens refunded. If admin does nothing: the democratic process continues.
3 governors on your team? You get 0.33
Granted on join. Does not regenerate at tally.
Statistical patterns. Effects of rule changes.
Who is proposing what and why it matters.
Patterns you might not see. Never prescribes.
The AI also writes game commentary in a sports-journalist voice.
Receives DM notifications when wild proposals are submitted. Can veto before tally (refunds tokens) or clear to confirm review.
If the admin does nothing, voting proceeds normally. The democratic process does not require admin permission.
Pinwheel Fates -- Built on the principles of Resonant Computing
